GR14prakassu:2: yathā sasarja nikhilaṃ tanme brūhi jagadguro // PS_1,1.1 //
GR14prakassu:6: svarūpaṃ naiva jānanti ramābrahmādayopi tu // PS_1,1.3 //

GR14prakassu:24: vasanti kḷptānandaste muktā bhuñjanti netarāḥ // PS_1,1.12 //
GR14prakassu:35: laya ityucyate sadbhiḥ na layosti svarūpataḥ /
GR14prakassu:38: layejīvādyabhāvena sā śaktiḥ kuṇṭhitā bhavet // PS_1,1.19 //
GR14prakassu:44: nānāyoni prāpikāsti śaktiḥ sṛṣṭau laye na tu // PS_1,1.22 //
GR14prakassu:46: sṛṣṭau laye na sā viṣṇorājñayā kuṇṭhitā bhavet // PS_1,1.23 //
GR14prakassu:49: sṛṣṭau na sāsti pralaye teṣāṃ nāśo hi tādṛśaḥ /
GR14prakassu:50: tamaḥ sthānāṃ pūrvakḷptaduḥkhabhogo layaḥ smṛtaḥ // PS_1,1.25 //
GR14prakassu:53: sraṣṭṛtvaśaktiḥ sṛṣṭau hi na laye syattato layaḥ /
GR14prakassu:54: hitvā jagatsarjanādyaṃ sarvadā śrīpatau ratiḥ // PS_1,1.27 //
GR14prakassu:58: deśataḥ kālato vyāptā varṇāsarvepi śāśvatāḥ // PS_1,1.29 //
GR14prakassu:92: laye svāpaṃ prāpayati liṅgabaddhān svadehagān // PS_1,1.46 //
GR14prakassu:97: tamaḥsaṃsthān sadā baddhān jaṭhare sthāpya keśavaḥ /
GR14prakassu:99: teṣu sṛjyān svayaṃ sṛṣṭvā yathāyogyaphalaṃ vibhuḥ /
GR14prakassu:100: sukhaṃ miśraṃ tathā duḥkhaṃ dātumaicchallayāntime // PS_1,1.50 //
GR14prakassu:102: laye samāliṅya hariṃ vinidrā parameśvarī // PS_1,1.51 //
GR14prakassu:110: chāyeva sūkṣmasthūloru rūpaṃ viṣṇuṃ samāśritā // PS_1,1.55 //
GR14prakassu:122: svayaṃ śrīḥ viṣṇubhāvajñā vedaistuṣṭāva vedavit // PS_1,1.61 //
GR14prakassu:128: sāṃśā samastadeśeṣu vyāptāḥ śuddhajaḍāḥ sadā // PS_1,1.64 //
GR14prakassu:134: rakṣitāḥ pralaye sṛṣṭāvekarūpā bhavanti hi // PS_1,1.67 //
GR14prakassu:172: aja ānanda indreśa ugra ūrja ṛtambharaḥ // PS_1,1.86 //
GR14prakassu:198: iti śrī paratattavanirṇaye prakāśasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamaparicchede prathamo
GR14prakassu:200: śrīhaṃsa uvāca saṃstuto bhagavānevaṃ tadaivotthāya keśavaḥ /
GR14prakassu:201: śūnyanāmātha jagṛhe paruṣākhyāṃ tanuṃ hariḥ // PS_1,2.1 //
GR14prakassu:207: muktyaihṛtyai tathā guptai sṛṣṭyai svecchātanurhariḥ // PS_1,2.4 //
GR14prakassu:229: iti śrī paratatvanirṇaye prakāśasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamaparicchede dvitīyodhyāyaḥ
GR14prakassu:230: śrīhaṃsa uvāca jālarandhrāt grahāviṣṭā sūryaraśmiprabhā bhuvi /
GR14prakassu:231: yadā bhavanti tasyāḥ samīpe tirgāsthitaḥ // PS_1,3.1 //
GR14prakassu:234: yaṃ kālaṃ sūkṣmadṛgveda sa kālaḥ paramāṇukaḥ /
GR14prakassu:235: tacchatāṃśo hi devānāṃ tacchatāṃśobjajasya tu // PS_1,3.3 //
GR14prakassu:236: bhūmau sthitānāṃ martyānāṃ yaḥ kālaḥ paramāṇukaḥ /
GR14prakassu:242: truṭiḥ tribhiśca tryaṇukaiḥ vedhaḥ syāttatrayeṇa tu /
GR14prakassu:255: karkādi kārmukānteṣu yadā carati bhaskaraḥ // PS_1,3.13 //
GR14prakassu:271: kḷptaḥ kālaḥ kāladṛgbhiḥ mahāyuga itīryate // PS_1,3.21 //
GR14prakassu:281: kḷptaḥ kālaḥ kālavidbhiḥ mahāyuga itīryate // PS_1,3.26 //
GR14prakassu:290: rītriśca tāvatī tasya ahorātrā tu tādṛśā /
GR14prakassu:299: yāvatāṃ sūkṣmataḥ sṛṣṭiḥ sthūlasṛṣṭistu tāvatā // PS_1,3.35 //
GR14prakassu:301: ādyasya brahmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ pañcāśadvatsarānti me // PS_1,3.36 //
GR14prakassu:317: kāle bhāvinyapi hariḥ sṛṣṭyādīśaḥ kariṣyati // PS_1,3.44 //
GR14prakassu:319: laṅghituṃ pūrṇaśakterhi vaśe sarvaṃ carācaram // PS_1,3.45 //
GR14prakassu:333: naṣṭeṣu satsukāleṣu vartamāneṣu vai kramāt // PS_1,3.52 //
GR14prakassu:361: evaṃ kālagatiṃ jānan kālabhītiṃ tariṣyati // PS_1,3.66 //
GR14prakassu:365: brahmāṇaṃ garuḍaṃ śeṣam idraṃ prāṇaṃ raviṃ surān // PS_1,3.68 //
GR14prakassu:380: vibhinno viśvato viṣṇuḥ deśato guṇato vibhuḥ /
GR14prakassu:383: iti śrī paratattavanarṇaye prakāśasaṃhitāyāṃ prathamaparicchede tṛtīyo
GR14prakassu:385: śrīhaṃsa uvāca sūkṣmaṃ sarvajagadbījaṃ mitaṃ trātaṃ ca viṣṇunā /
GR14prakassu:397: sṛṣṭau laye ramā tasya māninī ca nirantaram /
GR14prakassu:410: tajjanyamapyanityaṃ syāttatra cittaṃ na doṣayuk // PS_1,4.13 //
GR14prakassu:418: racite bhārate varṣe yathā mānuṣasattanum // PS_1,4.17 //
GR14prakassu:424: svārūpikaṃ mano nityaṃ tataḥ svārūpikī matiḥ // PS_1,4.20 //
GR14prakassu:425: vyaktā bhavati nityā sā bhaktiḥ svārūpikī tathā /
GR14prakassu:438: dravyamityeva sarveṣāṃ na guṇaḥ kasyacinmate // PS_1,4.27 //
GR14prakassu:446: yathārtha eva tatroktaṃ grāhyaṃ śrīharitatparaiḥ // PS_1,4.31 //
GR14prakassu:447: vārāhaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ pādmaṃ vāyuproktaṃ ca gāruḍam /
GR14prakassu:448: śrīmadbhāgavataṃ caiva sātvikānīti hi śrutiḥ // PS_1,4.32 //
GR14prakassu:450: bhaviṣyaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ ca rājasāni ṣaḍaiva hi // PS_1,4.33 //
GR14prakassu:451: mātsyaṃ kaurmyaṃ tathā laiṅgyaṃ śaivaṃ skāndaṃ tathaiva ca /
GR14prakassu:452: pāśupatasaṃjñikaṃ ceti tāmasāni vido viduḥ // PS_1,4.34 //
GR14prakassu:466: gamyaṃ satyaṃ ca sukhacinmayaṃ viṣṇuṃ sanātanam // PS_1,4.41 //
GR14prakassu:470: śrīhaṃsa uvāca jñānendriyāṇi pañcāni pañcakarmendriyāṇi ca /
GR14prakassu:479: tajjanyau prākṛtau vāyusaṃśrayau naśvarau matau // PS_1,5.5 //
GR14prakassu:481: jñānātmakānāṃ te sarve dvividhāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // PS_1,5.6 //
GR14prakassu:483: aśubhāḥ pratikūlāśca punaste trividhā matāḥ // PS_1,5.7 //
GR14prakassu:497: sarvasvarūpaceṣṭāsu parāpekṣā na yasya hi // PS_1,5.14 //
GR14prakassu:498: sa svantantra iti proktaḥ sa viṣṇurnetaraḥ kvacit /
GR14prakassu:504: siddhameva svarūpe ca jñāne karmaṇyapi sphuṭam /
GR14prakassu:511: bhayādīni ca yogyebhyaḥ uttameṣvalpameva ca // PS_1,5.21 //
GR14prakassu:512: jñānaṃ muktirayogyasya na ca svapnepi dṛśyate /
GR14prakassu:514: sṛṣṭiṃ sthitiṃ saṃhṛtiṃ ca niyatiṃ jagatosya tu /
GR14prakassu:515: jñānājñāne tamomokṣau viṣṇunaiva vido viduḥ // PS_1,5.23 //
GR14prakassu:517: tadindriyāṇi sūkṣmāṇi sūkṣmāṇyeva sthirāṇi tu // PS_1,5.24 //
GR14prakassu:524: vṛddhiṃ hāniṃ ca labhate guṇairdeṣaiḥ svarūpataḥ /
GR14prakassu:527: paṭalaṃ kāmilā kācaḥ pratidīdhiti saṅgatiḥ // PS_1,5.29 //
GR14prakassu:541: doṣahīnasya ca rasajñānaṃ janayati sphuṭam // PS_1,5.36 //
GR14prakassu:543: duṣṭā paryuṣitā yāmahīnā pūtiyutā rasāḥ // PS_1,5.37 //
GR14prakassu:544: sadoṣā rasasambandhe rasanā jñānadā na hi /
GR14prakassu:560: heyā arthāśca hastābhyāṃ parityājyāḥ sadā matāḥ /
GR14prakassu:567: pakvāpakvaṃ ca bhuktaṃ ca vātaṃ jīrṇaṃ ca kukṣigam // PS_1,5.49 //
GR14prakassu:571: doṣāḥ nirodhātisārāḥ pāyorna yadi kāryakṛt // PS_1,5.51 //
GR14prakassu:577: arthakriyākāri taddhi nānyathā bhavati dhruvam // PS_1,5.54 //
GR14prakassu:587: tamaḥ śabdagataṃ prāhuḥ mohaḥ sparśagato mataḥ // PS_1,5.59 //
GR14prakassu:603: rakṣitāḥ pralaye sṛṣṭā nityaṃ tadanapāyinā // PS_1,5.67 //
GR14prakassu:611: yogyā nityasṛtisthāśca tamo yogyāśca kṛtsnaśaḥ // PS_1,5.71 //
GR14prakassu:612: sarvepi liṅgasambaddhā ye te jīvā na cānyathā /
GR14prakassu:624: naiva sṛṣṭistu muktānāṃ baddhānāṃ na hi sarvaśaḥ // PS_1,6.4 //
GR14prakassu:626: sṛṣṭiḥ saṃkhyā niyamataḥ tātvikātātvikeṣu ca // PS_1,6.5 //
GR14prakassu:640: kāle mukto bhavatyeva mucyate naikadaiva hi // PS_1,6.12 //
GR14prakassu:650: mitrādīnāṃ ca navabhistūkta śeṣagaṇasya tu // PS_1,6.17 //
GR14prakassu:651: aṣṭabhiḥ saptabhiḥ kalpaiḥ sanakādi gaṇasya tu /
GR14prakassu:656: gandharvāṇāntu kalpābhyāṃ martyānāṃ tu tathaikataḥ // PS_1,6.20 //
GR14prakassu:670: mitā ājānajaistulyāḥ karmadevaiḥ samāḥ parāḥ // PS_1,6.27 //
GR14prakassu:673: gandharvāstu śataṃ teṣu aṣṭau tulyāstu karmajaiḥ /
GR14prakassu:684: tato nyūnāstu rājāno martyoccāstu tato 'dhamāḥ // PS_1,6.34 //
GR14prakassu:696: laye sarve liṅgabaddhāḥ śūnyakukṣā vasanti hi // PS_1,6.40 //
GR14prakassu:702: tatra pūrvānantakalpe jīvāḥ satsādhanena ca // PS_1,6.43 //
GR14prakassu:706: na caikakāle sarveṣāṃ sṛṣṭiḥ sā kālabhedataḥ // PS_1,6.45 //
GR14prakassu:710: brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭitaḥ paścādvāyoḥ sṛṣṭiḥ śatābdataḥ // PS_1,6.47 //
GR14prakassu:728: bhūrnāmakendirā tatra ceṣṭakā tasya māninī // PS_1,6.56 //
GR14prakassu:730: daśapralayakāle tu bhūmyā satvasya pārśvagāḥ // PS_1,6.57 //
GR14prakassu:737: bhavanti ca rajaḥ spṛṣṭāḥ satvapārśvagatā laye /
GR14prakassu:740: atyalpaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ te raktoraktī karotyalam // PS_1,6.62 //
GR14prakassu:741: ekaḥ śuddho rājasāṃśaḥ paricchede tu rājase /
GR14prakassu:742: madhye tiṣṭhantyapi laye rājasāṇu samā ime // PS_1,6.63 //
GR14prakassu:755: jaḍāyāṃ prakṛtau cāpi liṅgadehe tathaiva ca /
GR14prakassu:760: vadantyeva laye yogo bhavati śrīharīcchayā // PS_1,6.72 //
GR14prakassu:761: sāmyāvasthāṃ budhāḥ prāhuḥ etāṃ prakṛtiliṅgayoḥ // PS_1,6.73 //
GR14prakassu:768: yasmannakāle yasya sūkṣmaḥ nāśo bhavati viṣṇunā // PS_1,7.3 //
GR14prakassu:773: ruddhā bhavanti sāmye tu vaiṣamye vyaktimañjasā /
GR14prakassu:774: yāntyavasthādvayaṃ liṅge laye sṛṣṭau kramātkila // PS_1,7.6 //
GR14prakassu:775: kṣaṇakṣaṇena bhramatāṃ sa tāṃ savyena cānyathā /
GR14prakassu:778: sātvikī rājasī ceti tāmasīti samastaśaḥ // PS_1,7.8 //
GR14prakassu:780: madhyamānāntu jīvānāṃ rājasī tāmasī matiḥ // PS_1,7.9 //
GR14prakassu:788: bāhyamasvārūpikaṃ ca kāmakrodhādikaṃ ca yat // PS_1,7.13 //
GR14prakassu:795: bāhyaliṅgagataṃ karma na tu svārūpikaṃ matam /
GR14prakassu:796: anādyavidyākāmau cānādi karma ca liṅgagam // PS_1,7.17 //
GR14prakassu:798: kālena bhārate varṣe labdhajanmāpi mānuṣam // PS_1,7.18 //
GR14prakassu:809: ato bāhyaṃ na svarūpā avidyādyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
GR14prakassu:810: jñānājñāne svarūpasthe nitye naiva ca naśvare // PS_1,7.24 //
GR14prakassu:812: tadā jīvasya sarvasya na bhavanti kadācana // PS_1,7.25 //
GR14prakassu:820: tāmasī rājasī ceti sāmyāvasthā dvidhā matā // PS_1,7.29 //
GR14prakassu:821: sāmyāvasthā sātvike tu na kvāpi kila vidyate /
GR14prakassu:822: dvābhyāntu sāmyavasthābhyāṃ liṅgastābhyāṃ janasya tu // PS_1,7.30 //
GR14prakassu:823: laye sarvasya tāṃ nidrāṃ nāśaṃ prāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ /
GR14prakassu:824: yadā yogecchoparamaḥ tadā jñāpayati prabhuḥ // PS_1,7.31 //
GR14prakassu:826: vaiṣamye sati liṅge tu jananecchā hi jāyate // PS_1,7.32 //
GR14prakassu:827: yadecchā jāyate jantostadā sṛjati taṃ prabhuḥ /
GR14prakassu:832: laye satvapraviṣṭā ye daśate rājasāṇavaḥ // PS_1,7.35 //
GR14prakassu:834: sṛṣṭikāle śriyānunnā rajo bhāgaṃ viśanti hi // PS_1,7.36 //
GR14prakassu:840: prakṛtau liṅgadeho 'pi evaṃ yadi guṇasthitiḥ // PS_1,7.39 //
GR14prakassu:844: yuktāstāmasa bhāgaṃ hi viśanti śrīsamīritāḥ // PS_1,7.41 //
GR14prakassu:847: tatra sthitvā laye bhūyaḥ sṛṣṭikāla upāgate /
GR14prakassu:855: rajo vaiṣamyataḥ sṛṣṭiḥ tamo vaiṣamyato layaḥ // PS_1,7.47 //
GR14prakassu:857: śrīhaṃsa uvāca vyatīte layakāle tu sṛṣṭikāla upāgate /
GR14prakassu:866: sa vāyumekaṃ liṅge taṃ gṛhītvānyān sucetanān // PS_1,8.5 //
GR14prakassu:873: nyapatan tatra yobinduḥ sātvikaḥ sa tu nirmalaḥ /
GR14prakassu:880: tato māyā prārthitaḥ san vāsudevastadādimaḥ // PS_1,8.12 //
GR14prakassu:884: sūkṣmarūpaṃ tu tadvīryaṃ prākṛtaṃ prākṣipaddhariḥ // PS_1,8.14 //
GR14prakassu:886: guṇatrayāṇavaḥ pūrvaṃ sāṃkhyā niyamataḥ sthitāḥ // PS_1,8.15 //
GR14prakassu:887: yāvantaste sadā nityāḥ teṣāṃ nāśo na vidyate /
GR14prakassu:888: tatra satvāṇavaḥ sarve daśadhopacitāḥ sadā // PS_1,8.16 //
GR14prakassu:894: ṛjūnāṃ sūkṣmagāḥ pādopacitāḥ prabhavanti hi // PS_1,8.19 //
GR14prakassu:904: tadā hyavasthā tritayaṃ tadviśeṣādime sukham // PS_1,8.24 //
GR14prakassu:911: karotyayaṃ madhyagākhya tritayena sa eva hi /
GR14prakassu:914: niraṃśānāṃ ca jīvānāṃ jāgratāṃ sampravartakaḥ // PS_1,8.29 //
GR14prakassu:921: teṣu bhogāya dattāni bhuktvā nāśaṃ prayānti hi /
GR14prakassu:922: bhogāya ca pradattāni ardhabhuktāni sarvaśaḥ // PS_1,8.33 //
GR14prakassu:925: na nayānti ca sarvāṇi bhogayogyānya saṃśayaḥ /
GR14prakassu:928: hariṇā jīvabhogāya na dattāni hyanantaśaḥ // PS_1,8.36 //
GR14prakassu:930: sañcitānyapi tānīha aparokṣe sati sphuṭam // PS_1,8.37 //
GR14prakassu:937: kvāpi no ghaṭate bhoktuṃ kintu śrīviṣṇudarśane /
GR14prakassu:938: naiṣāṃ phalaṃ hi jīvānāṃ bhavedityājñayā hareḥ // PS_1,8.41 //
GR14prakassu:941: yacchanti na phalaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā tasya karhicit /
GR14prakassu:943: bodhayantyapi he jīva na te sañcitato bhayam /
GR14prakassu:944: iti kāraṇato nāśaṃ sañcitasya vadanti hi // PS_1,8.44 //
GR14prakassu:950: yacchanti na phalaṃ teṣāmato na śliṣyate janaḥ // PS_1,8.47 //
GR14prakassu:952: gṛhṇantīṣṭaṃ kāmyapuṇyaṃ tadiṣṭāḥ prāpnuvanti hi // PS_1,8.48 //
GR14prakassu:957: bhītyā prītyā āveśato vā kṛtaṃ karma śubhāśubham /
GR14prakassu:958: jñāyanneva karotyeṣaḥ bhuṅkte jāgṛddhi tatphalam // PS_1,8.51 //
GR14prakassu:961: niraye vā tamasi vā vaikuṇṭhādiṣu vā janaḥ /
GR14prakassu:962: jāgradbhuṅkte karmaphalaṃ viśvādhīnaḥ sadaiva hi // PS_1,8.53 //
GR14prakassu:966: svaprārabdhaphalaṃ yānti te sarve hyaparokṣiṇaḥ // PS_1,8.55 //
GR14prakassu:969: riyuḥ trīn karmaṇā lokān jñānenaiva taduttarān /
GR14prakassu:970: tatra makhyā hariṃ yānti tadanye vāyumeva tu // PS_1,8.57 //
GR14prakassu:971: apakvā ye na te yānti vāyuṃ vā harimeva vā /
GR14prakassu:984: devānāṃ nirayo naiva tamaścāpi kathañcana // PS_1,8.64 //
GR14prakassu:985: nā surāṇāṃ tathā muktiḥ kadācit kenacit kvacit /
GR14prakassu:988: tamo mithyājñānayogāt jñānenaiva hareḥ padam // PS_1,8.66 //
GR14prakassu:989: teṣāṃ prāgukta karmottha phalaṃ vai jāgratā bhavet /
GR14prakassu:990: jāgratpravartako viśvaḥ so 'ja dakṣākṣigo bhavet // PS_1,8.67 //
GR14prakassu:992: na dhātuḥ sañcitaṃ kāmyaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ pātakādikam // PS_1,8.68 //
GR14prakassu:994: na duricchānānyaratiḥ na bhogecchā kusaṅgatiḥ // PS_1,8.69 //
GR14prakassu:999: sontaraṅgo hareḥ sākṣāt sarvotkṛṣṭa priyo mataḥ /
GR14prakassu:1006: taddhehaliṅgajaṃ śuddhaṃ raja ādāya tejasaḥ // PS_1,8.75 //
GR14prakassu:1014: na jāgradṛṣṭipathagāḥ kintu tatkāla kalpitāḥ // PS_1,8.79 //
GR14prakassu:1026: yadāśliṣyati taṃ devaḥ tadā nidrāṃ prayacchati // PS_1,8.85 //

GR14prakassu:3052: mahātale tu(ku) sarpāṇāṃ sthānaṃ vipati bibhratam // PS_2,4.90 //
GR14prakassu:3053: śivasya varatonyeṣu caranto yānti dur(gar)matiḥ // PS_2,4.91 //
GR14prakassu:3064: nitye vasanti narake hatā haryādi daiḥdvagddha // PS_2,5.5 //
GR14prakassu:3068: vasanti nityanarake kālādyāsyanti vai tamaḥ // PS_2,5.7 //
GR14prakassu:3070: sadārtān bhīṣayanti daityān yamasya vaśavartinī // PS_2,5.8 //
GR14prakassu:3072: mṛtāyāsyanti narakaṃ tadvaṃśyā(syā)nāṃ sa āśrayaḥ(maḥ) // PS_2,5.9 //
GR14prakassu:3080: sadaikakuṇḍalo bhāsvan musalaḥ sahalaḥ prabhuḥ // PS_2,5.13 //
GR14prakassu:3086: pātāladakṣiṇe bhāge saṃya(mya)minyāṃ puraḥ prabhuḥ // PS_2,5.16 //
GR14prakassu:3100: sa tānabhyagatān dṛṣṭvā yamadaṇḍaṃ paretarāṭ // PS_2,5.23 //
GR14prakassu:3101: teṣāṃ mūrdhni sthāpayati yātanā dehināṃ tadā /
GR14prakassu:3102: puṇyapāpāni te sarve kīrtayanti kṛtāni ca // PS_2,5.24 //
GR14prakassu:3104: patreṣu tāni(ḷḥi) likhitānyapi te prapaṭhanti ca // PS_2,5.25 //
GR14prakassu:3134: nityau dvau narakau tatra gatāyānti tamaḥ kramāt // PS_2,5.40 //
GR14prakassu:3141: prāpyasthūlāni ṛṣibhiḥ svapūrvaṃ pātike(prāntike) kramāt // PS_2,5.44 //
GR14prakassu:3143: śrībhagavānuvāca atalādyā saptalokāḥ bile svargāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
GR14prakassu:3144: meroradhastātte sarve prāyaśo jñāni saṅkulāḥ // PS_2,6.1 //
GR14prakassu:3146: tasmin hi bhārate varṣe barhiṣmattākhyapattane // PS_2,6.2 //
GR14prakassu:3153: bhāryayā saha tatrāgāt sarasvatyāṃ taṭaṃ prati /
GR14prakassu:3155: puṇyāśramaṃ pradatvāttu manuḥ kṛchrāt svakaṃ puram /
GR14prakassu:3156: gate rājani sā devī vastrābharaṇasañcayam // PS_2,6.7 //
GR14prakassu:3160: hitaṃ vadeti sā devī(vavre) taṃ tu yogaprabhāvataḥ // PS_2,6.9 //
GR14prakassu:3164: svayaṃ tadāhṛde snātvā babhau sarvamanoharaḥ // PS_2,6.11 //
GR14prakassu:3166: tuṣṭvā sa satayā sārdhaṃ remebdaśatakaṃ ṛṣiḥ // PS_2,6.12 //
GR14prakassu:3171: tatputrikānāṃ nāmāni śruṇu me vadataḥ sadā /
GR14prakassu:3172: kalānasūyā śraddhā ca havirbhūśca gatiḥ kriyā // PS_2,6.15 //
GR14prakassu:3176: pulahāya gatiṃ prādāt kratave sakriyāṃ sutām // PS_2,6.17 //
GR14prakassu:3178: atharvaṇāya ca khyātiṃ datvā hṛṣṭo babhūva ha // PS_2,6.18 //
GR14prakassu:3179: tataḥ śatābdaṃ cikrīḍya tatosyāṃ kapilaṃ vyadhāt /
GR14prakassu:3180: sa kardama tapoyogāt sākṣānnārāyaṇo bhavat // PS_2,6.19 //
GR14prakassu:3181: tyaktvā vimānaṃ bhāryāṃ ca kardamastapase yayau /
GR14prakassu:3202: bhūtāṅgirakṛśāśvebhyo dve dve datte ca bhānujāḥ // PS_2,6.30 //
GR14prakassu:3204: dattāścataśro dakṣāya daśadharmāya tāsu vai // PS_2,6.31 //
GR14prakassu:3218: omityuktvā tu kālindyāṃ magno nāgācciraṃ nṛpaḥ /
GR14prakassu:3221: pūrvamāptaṃ hareścakraṃ kṛtyāṃ hatvā vibhīṣayat // PS_2,6.39 //
GR14prakassu:3222: sa ṛṣiḥ sarvalokeśaiḥ viṣṇunā ca nirākṛtaḥ /
GR14prakassu:3223: ambarīśaṃ prāpya tena mocito bhojitobhyagāt // PS_2,6.40 //
GR14prakassu:3225: sadyonnaṃ dīyatāmahyam iti taistuṣṭa āvrajat // PS_2,6.41 //
GR14prakassu:3231: bharadvājo marudbhiḥ sa pālitobhūt purā kila // PS_2,6.44 //
GR14prakassu:3233: niḥsantāne sati tadā marutastasya taṃ daduḥ // PS_2,6.45 //
GR14prakassu:3238: reto dadhāra droṇī(ṇe) saḥ tasmādroṇo bhavadguruḥ /
GR14prakassu:3239: tasmāt kṛpī śaṅkarāṃśamaśvatthāmā samāpa hi // PS_2,6.48 //
GR14prakassu:3240: bṛhaspatestu tārābhyāṃ kaca āsīt sutaḥ purā /
GR14prakassu:3242: niṣiddhā tena sā vidyā nasyātta iti śāsayat /
GR14prakassu:3254: tāṃ vivastrāṃ samudhṛtya svottarīyaṃ dadau nṛpaḥ /
GR14prakassu:3255: taṃ dhṛtvā sā gṛhaṃ prāparājāgāt svapuraṃ tadā // PS_2,6.56 //
GR14prakassu:3256: tadarthaṃ kupitaṃ śukraṃ rājānatvā prasādya ca /
GR14prakassu:3258: śukro yayāti nṛpateḥ kanyāṃ svāṃ pradadau mudā /
GR14prakassu:3259: dāsyā śarmiṣṭayā yuktāṃ dāsī rājñe bhavet satī // PS_2,6.58 //
GR14prakassu:3261: arjuno yo daśagrīvaṃ nigṛhya punarāpa tat // PS_2,6.59 //
